Title: A Strange Note
Text:
Ad Lines Draft
Playing Peaks of Prestige Boosts Intelligence
Note: False advertising.

Countless Echoes. Limitless tactics. You could be the next Apex duelist!
Note: I'll use this as the slogan.

I'm Clang Bang. Give me fifty Shell Credits to hear my revenge plan in Peaks of Prestige.
Note: This one's well-received. Maybe I should write a few more in this style...
Additional note: Once Peaks of Prestige makes real money, I'll definitely switch to more formal ads...

To save the failing Peaks of Prestige, I, the creator of the game, am stepping in as customer service!
Note: Too close to home!

(Below are more notes on ad slogans.)
